Hi! I adore practicing yoga with you through your amazing videos. I have a constructive criticism to make, though, and I hope this gets read. The ending music is totally off. I work with music selection and editing (irrelevant, but I have the vocabulary to pinpoint why it feels so and what could feel better), and I think something more subtle and less high pitched could be better to ease us out of the practice. Maybe something less "corporate motivational" and more minimalistic, loopish, fewer elements, to get the driving force for "regular life" started again. Terry Riley, Philip Glass sort of music?
